website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for romantic summer evenings or for adding a unique decorative touch for your next party. Great option for wedding decor, too.
pros: Warm LED lights provide a subtle glow
Select from multiple effects like tinkling and fading
Also has a memory function so your chosen settings won’t reset each time you turn the lights on
cons: Not tangle-free, so they shouldn’t be used as an doorway

website_summaries.verdict: While they're rated for both indoor and outdoor use, these are best reserved for the indoors.
pros: A higher than average light per strand count at 306 LED lights for the entire set
Comes with the standard 8 lighting patterns – combination, waves, sequential, slow, chasing, slow fade, twinkle, and steady
The memory function stays on the last setting
cons: Some units have a problem with the plug slipping out of the electrical outlet

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: Bought it last year and used it once for an event for a couple of days. Plugged it in this year and only half of the lights work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jared Martin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your momey
customer_reviews.text: The minute I went to hang them up they turned into a tangled mess. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Buscher

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Perfect lighting for summer nights sitting ouside on our porch!
customer_reviews.author: Suzyq1404

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! Glad we went with the longer set. You can just barely see them in this pic but trust me... they were worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Be creative !
customer_reviews.text: I hung the light curtain horizontally across the basement ceiling over the joists with small brass cup hooks. No need to finish the ceiling and provides additional decorative lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Rpm

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My porch needed some mood lighting and I think I nailed it
customer_reviews.author: Laura Neville

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for the backdrop for my daughter’s wedding. Loved how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product....take your time hanging
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look this gave our Gatsby party. Was such as pretty backdrop for photos. The one thing is you have to really careful when hanging not too tangle it up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Liggy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Turned out beautiful for what I planned. Easy to use and unravel. Follow the instructions; hang lights first, then let down each section. Absolutely love it. I did string these lights over a king size bed. They are longer than shown here. I basically folded them in half to use for the length of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany DSouza

customer_reviews.title: Bad review for great lights.
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard review, I absolutely love this product I’ve purchased 20 or more boxes and have them hanging in my bar business. Unfortunately...they go out so fast. I realized it was the actual plug and not the lights after I purchased another 5 boxes to replace them. I’m not sure if you guys should sell the plug end separately or work on adjusting the problem. It sucks. If you sold the plug separately I’d buy to fix the lights I have now or I can’t continue to purchase these lights. If YOU WANT LONG TIME USE, and I’m talking more than 2 weeks out of these find something else. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding/party decor, lighting with a wow factor
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for one of the many events of my pakistani weddings back in 2017 for decor in my living room. So easy to put on and they packaged it really nicely and did not come tangled. They were super long so can work well for alot of wall lengths I imagine. I liked how they werent too bright because you can take better pics and gives you good lighting for pics lol also had a variety of light settings that
customer_reviews.author: Sahar Afshan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for what we wanted. I used these to decorate my teenage daughters room. It turned out very nice in my opinion. I would recommend being very careful when unboxing because each strand can get tangled easily. DO NOT remove the ties until after you've hung it in place!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: They work great for what we did to the Student Center. Really changed the way the stage looks. probably should've ordered two though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 2 MONTHS.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our holiday events. We put it up for a late October event 2017 and used it less than a dozen times from October through December 2017. During the New Years Eve weekend (a few weeks ago) for a family gathering it stopped working. We checked all plugs, and connections and our normal twinkle lights worked in the plug. The curtain just stopped working. VERY DISAPPOINTING! Waste of money. My window to return has been removed. I'm going to try to call to see if I can return.
customer_reviews.author: karen fridlund

customer_reviews.title: Love love love. One tip...
customer_reviews.text: We love these. Nice warm light. Decent 'patterns'. Look great with curtains closed and opened. One tip: the strands that drop down are individually bundled. When installing, do *not* unwrap them. Hang the main 'wire' first and then unwrap each strand so they don't get tangled. Ordering more of these next year.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! I was very hesitant to buy lights online and I took a long time reading reviews, etc of many products. Trust me, these are the best ones! I love how they can connect to more string lights if needed. They are so beautiful and shipped quickly! I'm ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sis and I love them! *UPDATED*
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought these for my sister as a permanent fixture on the patio. Once the Christmas lights come down they'll really be a sight. The remote works great. We are both pretty wiped out at the end of the day to do something like changing cycles manually. *Update-2/19/20 These lights are not meant to be placed out where the outdoor elements can get to them. Water was getting into the bulb protector sleeves causing corrosion and discoloration. I took them down before any real damage was done, but these are for temp outdoor use only. I'll find a permanent indoor place once I move.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica "Krash" J.

customer_reviews.title: I was "this close"...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are pretty enough but what they don't tell you or at least I didn't realize is you can not connect one to another so that you can run them as one unit. They each plug into the electrical outlet but not to each other. Crazy if you actually want to hook them all together. I kept them but really not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: DocVicki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Weddings
customer_reviews.text: Used these behind our sweetheart table at our wedding and they looked perfect. 4 stars only because it was a pain to untangle out of the box. it was also a little hard to find the "solid" mode. just when you think you have it, they start fading. UPDATE: I just hung these for Christmas at the eve of our garage outside. After just a week and one or two rains I'm noticing brown color in the lights. I'm guessing rust. Hasn't affected the light output that I can tell, but it's noticeable walking by. Hope it doesn't cause anything else
customer_reviews.author: Micah Paul

customer_reviews.title: 2nd strand only half lit up 🙁 Sad being i thought I could count on them to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 One started smoking when setting up at wedding, had to throw them away!! 2nd strand only half lit up 🙁 Sad being i thought I could count on them to make my wedding alter perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Such great lights! Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out with how much I LOVE these lights. They were easy to hang up, and one set goes a looonnngggg way. Literally. They are vibrant and have many twinkling options to choose from. I got mine in a warm white and they are illuminating at night, my balcony really stands out. Even during the day they were bright. Would 100% suggest using a staple gun (T25 staples) to hang them up- it made it much easier and felt very secure. I used the twist ties that come with it to help tie together the long pieces of lights and it really worked out well. So elegant and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Annamaria

customer_reviews.title: Overall —good but slightly misrepresented product
customer_reviews.text: Little too bright and the functions on it are quite strange. Blinking rapidly x5 settings or just bright — no remote included? Only the plug in where you push a button for rapid bright blinking or JUST bright — overall it is very pretty but I wish it had better settings - also quite irritating to put up and hang. Came without any clips to hang and it needs pretty specific hooks when hanging - lastly it was a mess to untie and to untangle and find the ends of each of the string lights- that was certainly more irritating than anything else
customer_reviews.author: linzielulu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These came out better than expected! I was kind of surprised since I was a bit skeptical about how amazon stock photos would differ from reality, but nevertheless, it was a great purchase. Planning to use this for an upcoming party and laid out its bright and subtle the color tone is just the right level of warmness and not to cool like a few that I had come across. I would say it is a good buy and for the price and value it's worth getting compared to the ones you would find at brick and mortar stores. Hope you guys are able to make a good order decision! I sure well did!
customer_reviews.author: Justin T

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to untangle your patience
customer_reviews.text: My last set of lights broke and thus bought these but man am I still trying to untangle three days later!!!!!! I even followed the direction of not unwinding the individual strands but it’s still tangled and I’m still frustrated. They should have numbered their ties in the order number to open. Quality wise they are really thin. Not sure how sturdy they will be. The light is more on the yellow side rather than soft-white which is not what I expected. They are fairly easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tes

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: we LOVE LOVE LOVED these lights!!!!!! we had searched everywhere for these we even found some ready to take and they were charging $50!!!!!! ????? crazy!!! the price for these curtain lights is amazing and they work so great!!!!!!! i recommend these to anyone who would love romantic lighting or mood lighting or just extra lighting they are fantastic!!!!!!!! i love them everyone loved them!! the party we used them at - these lights got compliments !!! thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: CKDehesa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backdrop
customer_reviews.text: I love these little lights! They shined perfectly through the sheer curtains and made the room look romantic while still being bright.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Graf

customer_reviews.title: Teen room must have!
customer_reviews.text: The lights were packaged very neatly and made them easy to hang. We nailed them to a wall behind some mesh curtains for my daughter’s room and they look great! I like how the light protrudes off of the string to give the lights a more spread out look behind the curtain. The power cord is connected to a clapper outlet since these lights didn’t come with a remote and plug in behind her bed- now she can turn them on and off with a clap!
customer_reviews.author: Hil

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are wonderful! I ordered them as part of photography backdrop but am now using them to decorate my studio for the holidays. There are several different modes and the lighting is a nice warm color. I've purchased three boxes so far and have plans for a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working right away
customer_reviews.text: When first plugged in, all the strands lit. I hung them, then unwrapped the individual strands. When I got to the last one, 2 of every 3 strands went dead. I tried some gentle tweaks but could not get them to light. They are really beautiful, but I'm taking a refund rather than going through all the untangling and untying with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Powered

customer_reviews.title: These are long. Like longer than you think.
customer_reviews.text: So I know it's like, it's 19 ft by 9 ft, but the scale is lost a little until you unroll it from the package. The peak of the ceiling in my bedroom is 15 ft, so I decided, screw it, let's hang them up in my bedroom. They reach past my window which is 7ish ft below the area I hung them and I literally do not need any other light in my room. Going to order a second one for the rest of the ceiling area, too. The strings are heavy duty, but not bulky like Christmas lights, and they give a very beautiful glow. Will probably end up ordering more for the summer for our patio area.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Morrow

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFULLY BRILLIANT
customer_reviews.text: This curtain of lights in warm white is BEAUTIFUL! The directions for working the remote and suggestions on how to avoid tangling them is clear and well written. We ordered these for a bridal shower and have since used them for two family weddings! They are so fun and can really add a lot of beauty to a place - such as a gym for a wedding reception. They are magical and a good price - I would definitely recommend these over the fairy lights or combining multiple strings.
customer_reviews.author: ~Hannah~

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to light up a patio
customer_reviews.text: These lights exceeded my expectations. I don't have an outside electrical source on my patio, but I needed light in the evenings. The solar powered LED just didn't provide enough light. So, I bought these fairy lights and they're GORGEOUS! My patio is illuminated from inside my apartment where the lights are plugged in, the perfect solution to my power problem! I would recommend not unfolding the waterfall lights until the main string has been hung, it would be very confusing, that's my only nit. I also wish it had an off switch, so I wouldn't need to unplug the set when it's not in use, but the multiple settings is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These work and look great! I love the idea that once I put on the choice speed I wanted it stays there for the next times it comes on. It's beautiful in a window. Makes such a beautiful twinkle glow. I was tempted to just keep them up the whole year because they make such an ambience. But then it wouldn't be as special for next Christmas then. It looks great for any holiday. I used my timer for them to turn on and off. Worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this light curtain in May for my reception in September. We did not try it out in advance so when it was time to set everything up only every 4th strand worked, I was so very disappointed but it was too late to try and replace them so we used them as is. It certainly did NOT give met he effect I was looking for. Because we did not open the box and test them before time on use, my return date had already passed. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Can't string end to end
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for my backyard to string along a fence. But the problem is, I can't string them end to end. There's no male/female connection like on Christmas lights - just the one male connection to plug into an outlet. So now I have them strung up on the ceiling of my office. The plug is on a nice long string, making it easy to connect to the ever elusive outlets in offices and older homes. I would recommend these, depending on what you planned to use them for. It didn't work for my original purpose, but it works fine for it's re-purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Shleigh02

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these were way too long but I found a solution and just tied up the extra long pieces to the top with the metal twisty parts. They actually turned out nice. I was nervous at first because my curtains aren't sheer so they didn't diffuse the stronger light but it almost gives it a more starry effect this way. The remote control settings are nice. The flashing I think flashes too fast but I really like the fade option. Overall i would say get them but beware they ar longer than they arm in pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these lights when I got them and they worked perfect, then I put them back in the box ...
customer_reviews.text: I tested these lights when I got them and they worked perfect, then I put them back in the box brought them to my in laws and tried to use them a month later and they didn't work. I didn't use them within that month period, and it didn't matter which outlet I tried or what I did they just stopped working. Update: After posting my negative review the company quickly responded to me and asked for a more in depth explanation, and then offered me a refund or a replacement. I received the replacement and am very happy with the outcome. I really appreciate how amazing their customer service was.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Check rtn dates and items if electrical right away
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 boxes . One worked and the other did not. To be fair the disfunctional one was a new used item but I am pissed to be stuck with it as I cannot return . I ordered ahead as it said few in stock . Of course can't find anyone from the company, and Amazon phone contactgaveme aph# that is on functional. The other curtain worked and was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: EASIEST WAY TO UNTANGLE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews about people not being able to untangle them or it took an insane amount of time to do it, which terrified me, so this is how I did it! We used command strips specifically for hanging lights and we first hung up the main line that has the lights hanging down from it! From there, we unzip-tied each strand after they were hung, and it was a pretty simple process! We tried to untangle them without doing that at first and then the idea popped in my head and it was a LIFE SAVER! They're beautiful and I can't wait to put up a sheer curtain in front of them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Willis

customer_reviews.title: Love! But you have to UNPLUG TO TURN OFF.
customer_reviews.text: Love these so far. Just opened and installed. The only drawback so far is that the only way to turn them off is to unplug them. I plugged them into a remote socket so I can use a remote rather than going to the wall socket every time. I'll only need to go to the actual plug in order to change the mode. If these last for a while I'll be extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are just lovely! I highly recommend reading the instructions to in pack first and hand them while they are tired! My daughter was helping me unpack these lights and untied all the lights before we hung it and with in seconds they we matted together but we got them untangled and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L.AnneP.

customer_reviews.title: Warm Glow, Easy To Use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. You might need two people to help assemble it because of the length and multiplelines. The warm soft glow is very nice for my tan colored townhouse. Very glad I got this because I needed a "night light" for when I dont want to turn on the house lights. Bright enough to light up a room but dim enough so it's not overbearing. It is long so be sure to put it high up close to the ceiling or you'll be rolling the lights up. It has a remote on the plug in that gives you different light settings from blinking, to slowly changing to regular "on".
customer_reviews.author: Britt Bolling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights for Christmas decor
customer_reviews.text: I don’t remember getting a remote with mine but I love these twinkle lights. I used them in my Christmas decor and they are just so beautiful at night!! Word of advice, don’t take them all apart and unwind them until you put them up where you want them. Rookie mistake and I was untangling mine for awhile. Also, save yourself a couple extra minutes and buy the command hooks along with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: They’re pretty, but LONG and tend to tangle
customer_reviews.text: These lights are beautiful, but they are REALLY long, and they can tangle easily.I have them over my floor to ceiling window curtains in my living room and they still touch the floor, so I had to fold the bottom of each strand to prevent them getting stepped on. They’re nice for X-mas decorating if you want to create a design or hand them from something, like, 10 feet from the ground/floor. Otherwise, they’re kinda a LOT. The warm yellow/white light is gorgeous and not too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to dress up your outdoor space!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! My niece got married in our backyard last weekend. I was looking for something to dress things up a bit, especially our rock retaining wall. These lights did exactly that and our guests loved them. Every light on every strand worked, which was impressive too! We did not have any issue with tangling or installation. I just installed the main line of the curtain first and then went back and unrolled each individual strand one at a time. I was able to reverse the process and easily put the whole thing back in the original box for storage! I would definitely recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: These lights were exactly what I expected when I ordered. As others have mentioned, hang them first, THEN unravel each strand to prevent tangling. We are using this on the entire wall behind our tv to create a cozy effect in the evenings and they work wonderfully for that. They're also great to turn on the dim fading setting on particularly gloomy days just to brighten the mood of the indoors. Everything works great and I would recommend these to anyone looking for fairy/twinkle lights.
customer_reviews.author: Teena Pinckney

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights to use as a background but ended up placing them in the middle of my 10 x 10 canopy because the “strips” of light were long enough to spread them all around. I hope the video helps you see how one order of the lights managed to light up the canopy. That was the only light used to light the place up. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mireya Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS lights!! Perfect for capturing the joy and beauty of Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS!! They looked beautiful on the window especially at dusk! Captured the joy and beauty of Christmas so much that I turned one of the Pictures I took into a Christmas card!! Highly recommended! I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for backdrops.
customer_reviews.text: These were AMAZING!! I layered them on top of a backdrop and it brought the whole thing to life. Many different light functions. Covered the entire garage door plans another 4-5 on one side. You won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyhon59

customer_reviews.title: Can't string them together...
customer_reviews.text: We are using these on our patio and they are really pretty and even though we haven't had them long, they seem to hold up well outside. The biggest drawback I see is that they can't be strung together. I was hoping to use them all around the inside of our patio fence, but each string requires it's own outlet, so we are limited to one. :( Other than that, they are beautiful and seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patti V

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang up- covers a large wall!
customer_reviews.text: These lights have been up for a few days, I was able to hang them myself which was great, because I am a senior citizen. I love the festive effect they give my dining room! I hung them from the ceiling to floor across my double set of sliding glass doors to the pool. So they are pretty from the outside looking in, too! I didn't get a remote, but they are simple to plug in and hide the cord- it's long enough to be invisible until the lights start. Very nice, but for the price I'm hoping that they last a couple of years!
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning effect!
customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome. These created the exact effect we were going for at my parents' anniversary BBQ. People commented on them all night and I had to send everyone the link to buy their own. They are long, so pay attention to the dimensions. But you can always double up the strands to hang them closer to the ground..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Christina Larsen

customer_reviews.title: So pretty !
customer_reviews.text: I love these there so pretty 😍. They were easy to install. My advice would be to unwrap the lights one section at a time to avoid tangling them. There's different settings , they flicker , strobe etc. They don't come with a remote theirs a button on the plug itself. They look beautiful in my bedroom and I get alot of compliments on them. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: AAC

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing with a $7 piece of sheer fabric i picked up at the craft store. Just always remember... *tack it along the top where you want if BEFORE you start unravelling the verticle string of lights. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tamra T

customer_reviews.title: Light up the Night!
customer_reviews.text: My brother loves lights all year - not only at Christmas. He says, the minute he comes home - zap - on go the lights ! He says they make him happy! Hey, whatever works. I know I am always sad to take down my Christmas lights, so he really does have a point there.
customer_reviews.author: Teri S.

customer_reviews.title: Tangles easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered thinking I would be able to use. When I attempted to take a out box and get set up then lights tangled really bad. Never used them but one day I will attempt to untangle when I don’t have anything else to do. The lights are very bright and the potential is definitely there for a beautiful backdrop
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these lights and all the settings that change the ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lights and all the settings that change the nature of lighting! I have them hanging from the ceiling in front of my sliding glass doors but they are still too long theres several inches on the floor. Given that they are meant for indoor use only, shortening them would be a great idea for the manufacturer. However, I plan to stretch them across the ceiling horizontally with tulle after Christmas for fairy lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie B.

customer_reviews.title: Adds ambience to a patio!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these lights. Easy to put up, (beautifully packed) Easy to operate. If they are too long you can tie them shorter with the packing ties. They look lovely and add a party feel to any evening. I have them on my back porch, and strung two lots together.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and festive
customer_reviews.text: This curtain of lights transformed our "playroom" (storage now really) room into a beautiful and festive dining area for the holidays. My friends were so impressed by how pretty these lights made the room (and house). They are so versatile too. You can hang them vertically or horizontally along the ceiling. I did a little of both. We probably wont take these down for a very long time and look forward to using them in the years to come. Definitely worth the price. I gave a 4 to the remote control question because there isn't one. The button is on the plug but that's okay with me.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful, but WHAT A PAIN TO UNRAVEL!!
customer_reviews.text: Once they are up they look beautiful, but be VERY CAREFUL when you take them out of the box. Do NOT unravel the lines until they are hung. Its a good thing I don't mind puzzles cause I spent 30 min trying to untangle the lines after I dumped them out of the box. I was much more careful with the second strand. I used them for a garage party and wrapped each individual line up with a zip tie when I took them down & put away til next time.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Cue

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far.....
customer_reviews.text: Just got the lights last week. We put them up on our outdoor privacy screen. We opted to wrap the screen with the lights rather than just let them dangle down since the screen was shorter than the lights. Looks great during the day and gives a great ambiance at night. We love the remote control! I hope they last through the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decorations
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to decorate my linai on the back of my house for Christmas. The only issue we’ve had is the wind can get them tangled. The solution we came up with was to alternate the strings. One is inside the lanai and one is outside (see picture which doesn’t show them lit). They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Fran McP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy, and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are wonderful! Each string is individually tied so they won’t get tangled as you place them where you want. The can be used in so many ways. They make good night lights and decorations for bedrooms or parties. I love all the different settings the lights can do. I do wish you could change the brightness but other than that they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I used these fairy lights as a backdrop for my daughters wedding (head table). I thought they were easy to untangle and set-up. I loved the warm (almost yellowish) lighting instead of the bright white. I hope to be able to re-use them for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Learn from my mistake!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights with the intention of hanging them up like the collage photo (upper right). My mistake was untying the lights before hanging. It was a hot mess!! It tangled so quick and by the time I wanted to hang them I was so frustrated I put them back in the box without using them. The lighting I did see was dimmed and the lights are icicle string style. A waste of money for me!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Yikes!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how well these worked because I could never get them TO work! Second set of decorative lights from Amazon that were a total bust. I give up! My daughter, fiancee and I each tried to sort these out. It's like trying to hang a spider's web.
customer_reviews.author: purple rain

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that could make this better is if it had a light switch on it somewhere. You just have to plug it in or unplug it. But it works great, looks great, and I got a lot of compliments. Edit. I subtracted one star because they stopped working after about six months.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Light Decorations
customer_reviews.text: I decided to include the lights in my condo. I went with the softer light so that it would not be too stark. The lights went up very easily after following the directions. I have received plenty of compliments from friends and family. I was a little nervous that they may be overbearing indoors but they made the entire room feel so cozy and festive. My friend even mentioned keeping them up after the holidays because it adds a little pop. The lights do not overheat and the settings are easy to figure out. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: They stopped working in ten days.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in October but didn't put up until November 1. They stopped working on November 11 one day after the return window. I've had lots of lights in the past but theses we're the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Larry and Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought two set of lights for our little sukkah this year and they turn out perfect. They are very durable and we are definitely use them for another occasion. They can get tangled if you don't put away with care. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Denise Tekay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of lights and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lights. This was my first set of string curtain lights and I'm very pleased. The brightness is very nice and the color temperature is accurate. I purchased the 20 ft long strand and doubled it back on itself but it is very nice in length. Would purchase again or buy as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Arvin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty twinkling lights with different settings
customer_reviews.text: I got these lights about a year ago and they were awesome! I think 8 different light settings. The cord is long enough to wrap around an entire half of a room and create a beautiful aesthetic. Yesterday, I went to plug the lights in and they stopped working. I plugged something else into the outlet and it worked, so the lights stopped working for no reason and no I'm sad because they were gorgeous. :( I also never received a remote, but it's not really necessary as there's a button on the plug-in box where you can switch light settings.
customer_reviews.author: Camryn Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Receive Remote, otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for the most part, still have to figure out how to use the timer... but figuring there was no remote control with my order, I dont know if I'm able to set a timer? But otherwise I really like the warm lighting for my office space.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Really great lights!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. All lights worked, and they made my photo backdrop look lovely. Sure, they were hard to untangle, but it wasn't as bad as some other reviews said, and I kind of like doing that sort of thing. It's meditative. When I put them back in the box, I used small zip ties to keep them organized so the next use will be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L

customer_reviews.title: They actually work well and look good
customer_reviews.text: These curtains were used on my 9x15' porch for holiday lighting. The full length and width coverage was perfect and they were appropriately spaced. Very easy to work with following instructions. They are so light weight that winds will disturb but we locked them at the bottom by attaching them to a string which worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are nice accent lights for our backyard patio. They were a quick install - I like the setting feature that allows us to pick blinking, steady or intermittent lights - we went with the steady. We have them on a timer so they are on every evening for about 6-hours and they are still going strong. Will definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: bluesy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: The pic doesn’t show how pretty they really look in person. We have them behind a bamboo shade and looking at them from outside they are even more pretty. We keep them on 24/7. A lot of restaurants and stores here have them in their windows. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: dealsearcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I used these to replace a different set on my gazebo. It's a 12x10ft & they fit perfectly (the 10ft way) securing with a zip tie. Easy to operate although a remote control would be cool. Overall I'm pleased... hopefully they can hold up to the country wind we get out here!!! TBD
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: One of the boxes are damaged :(
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how come one can be crushed but not the other one in a perfect packed??? I don;t know yet if it is working or now :( Looks like one of them already used and returned!!!! I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Bero-Will

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but a hassle to put up
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall brightness and the beauty of it. Although pretty it was a little pain to put up but then again it can be expected. The remote options are very pleasing. I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Elias Valaveris

customer_reviews.title: Only half the lights work:(
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to brighten up my new room and I'm really depressed and I just put the lights up and half of them don't work. I don't want to take them down now and wrap them back up, so I'm just gonna leave them. But, you should know that your lights might not work. This sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Miche B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: I love how these have a memory setting and how they have different modes. My only complaint would have to be that when you purchase these, you will need to hang them where you want them first and then untangle them. The power cord is a little short but its nothing an extension chord cant fix. Other than that, beautiful lights for what I need them for. I will post updated pictures when I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, classic look at night
customer_reviews.text: Yes I had this led light curtain for over a year now and it’s amazing I love the effect of it at night and it can be a decorative background, back drop or any events you can think of. Easy to install. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: ELSIE MIGUELev

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as decorations for a party and they were perfect for the party. However, I also own a Roomba and the Roomba sucked one of the strands up and pulled the whole thing down. They were horribly tangled and now one of the strands doesn't work. However, if they're just hanging in your house without being sucked up by a robot, then they should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Z.

customer_reviews.title: pretty wedding decor
customer_reviews.text: came untangled, which was great- probably wont ever use again cause detangling will be a b****. Looked beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: Katiebeanx3

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE STAPLE GUN!
customer_reviews.text: These lights were fantastic... until I tried to staple them to the ceiling and broke them. They were exactly what I was looking for. The remote worked great and the brightness was perfect for my outdoor space.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my living room behind my curtains. The curtains are sheer to let light in during the day and I didn't like people being able to see into my windows at night. The lights light up the sheer fabric and it keeps people from seeing through them and into my home. They are very beautiful and give my living room a nice dim glow. I also like that the plug is low and can be plugged into a low wall outlet. The only downside is that the controller box doesn't have an option to turn the lights off. They have to be unplugged. Overall I love them and will be buying more for my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Added a really nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Remote control??? Mines did not come with a remote, but I still love 5hese fairy lights. They are just what I wanted. I actually like them more than I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: Shaundra

customer_reviews.title: everything is in tack
customer_reviews.text: it was not what I wanted to use for our back porch lighting, just opened up bos today, as was xmas lighting, can I please send it back?e
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Shimer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Sadly they didn’t work and the return time had passed. But I called Amazon Customer Service and they contacted the company. The company representative was very nice and they offered to replacement the item. Great concept and I’m sure I’ll love them!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Summers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Results
customer_reviews.text: Used these lights for the interior of a barn for a family gathering. We double hung strands as the wood dome ceiling soaked up light. We hung them down the 40 ft walls and it was impressive. These are definitely worth the cost and deliver a beautiful warm surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Brought elegance to my back yard.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but you do need to keep organized since the wires are thin. They easily get tangled but look great and are well worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Pares

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful back drop behind my daughters bed! Perfect nightlight. All lights worked, she loved it. Arrived early, packaged well, all bulbs worked! Highly recommend for a girls bedroom, wedding, reception, or even a christmas party
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I liked product but has cons
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product; lights had setting that allowed a steady light or blinking lights. The cons are ----takes time to unwrap and took longer to put away. Need to individually wrap back together, if not you will have a tangled mess. They do not link together (like Christmas lights), so you have to plug each one into a separate socket. I also found the plug to be too short. I bought two packs, so I needed two extension cords to plug them in. If you buy multiple packs you will need an extension cord for each. (If you want to buy I would suggest buying an extension strip with multiple outlets)
customer_reviews.author: Silvursabl

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got it for a church dance decor and have since used it in my room... definitely don't unravel until you've got it up then take it apart one string at a time and put away the same way to make it easy on your self with the tangling
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: A little long for indoors but great!
customer_reviews.text: By no fault of the product since they disclose the dimensions, these were longer than I expected and even when hung as high on a wall as possible these will drag on the floor. I ended up just looping them over each other to fix the issue!
customer_reviews.author: J Baker

customer_reviews.title: If they all work, beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are beautiful if they all work. One of the strands does not light up, thank goodness it's on the end. Still looks beautiful! Update: contacted customer service. Refund was provided. A company that stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi S Uren

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty lights
customer_reviews.text: beautiful curtain of lights - bought the bright white and the warm white - both are very pretty and are easily hung. I've a set in my living room for all year round. Provides a lovely waterfall of lights on a wall that can't hold nails (pictures or art) but the lights provide a delicate decor and a soft glow to a dark area. Very happy with purchase. Bought two more for my mother, she too is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Ravin DeStorm

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in the mode I select
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, they came quickly, they weren't tangled. However, they will not stay on the mode that I have selected. It's really irritating. I select a twinkling mode and about a minute later it just changes to the next mode, then the next and so on, it just constantly goes through all of the modes instead of allowing me to choose one. Can anyone tell me what I'm doing wrong? The instructions do not address this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outdoors only, terrible plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: Even after airing them for a week these lights still have a very strong plastic smell, too strong for me to keep them inside. They also get tangled very easily, I recommend untying the strands only after installing them.
customer_reviews.author: Eilidh

product_meta.title: LE 306 LED Curtain Lights 9.8 x 9.8 ft Fairy String Lights for Bedroom Wall Wedding Backdrop Patio Party Garden, Warm White, 8 Modes, Plug in Indoor Outdoor Decorative Window Twinkle Christmas Lights
feature_bullets: 9.84 ft * 9.84 ft 306 LED Icicle Lights: The soft white waterfall fairy lights come with 18 light strands and each string contains 17 pcs LED lights. 9.84 ft (118 inch) in width and height make it is wide and long enough to cover most of standard windows, walls and even perfect to wrap it around a canopy bed or pergola in the backyard.

Stay On & 7 Blinking Modes: Press the button on the transformer to cycle trough the 8 different light effects: Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-glo, Chasing/Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/Flash, and Steady On.

Safe and Heat Free: Come with an ETL Certified transformer and operated with low voltage (30 V DC, 120 mA). It is safe to touch and will not overheat for a long time use. Note: Use only the provided adapter, or one with the same voltage from a reputable manufacturer
Remember the Light Effect Settings. Do not have to manually select your preferred setting every time you turn them back on.

Great Decoration for Everyday use: It can not only be used as Christmas decor, party weddings backdrop, but also perfect for everyday use such as hanging it down across tapestry, sheers, drapes, glass slide door, plain wall or even installed as lighted divider of 2 rooms, and you can keep it up all year round after the holiday season.

specifications.Included Components: 10x10ft 306 LED Curtain Lights, UL Certified Transformer with Standard US Plug, 6 Languages User Manual, 100% Satisfaction Guarantee Customer Service
specifications.Special Features: Bright Curtain Style String Lights, Large Size, Low voltage, Cool and safe to touch, Clear white wire, 8 Modes controller with memory function, 10ft Long Wire, Vary in size color and power source
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,601 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
